Reviews.Title: Great package deal!
Reviews.Author: invisible
Reviews.Content: I really liked this package deal with all the items needed for the beginner who is getting started in digital SLR photography. The camera has settings very similar to those of other Canon cameras, so the learning curve is very fast, especially with the auto focus lenses.The only problem was the 75-300mm Canon telephoto lens had a factory defect - debris between its lens elements but the seller was VERY fast in shipping a replacement lens. (Don't be hard on Canon about this. I've seen similar debris inside a thousand dollar American made rifle scope so I know this happens to other brands.)

Reviews.Title: Good price!
Reviews.Author: City Hunter "City Hunter"
Reviews.Content: A very good combination camera set for beginning wantabe photographers.  I bought this set for my daughter.  It is versatile enough for many situations.  The bag that comes with this package doesn't seem to be big enough to carry all the accessories.

Reviews.Title: A great camera for a novice
Reviews.Author: Liv4music77
Reviews.Content: I am not an expert photographer by any means but this camera has taken superior pics over the holidays.  I have used the many camera settings to take pics of my daughters basketball games in the sports mode, it is fantastic.  This camera was recommended to me by my friend who is a professional photographer and I am so happy he did.  The price of this camera on Amazon was unbeatable when I bought it.  599.00 for package deal including zoom lens, wide angle lens, filters, sd card with all necessary adapters and cables, tri pod (which is light weight but works), bag, extra battery and so much more.  I couldn't touch this camera locally for less than 1000.00 with all of the extras.  With this camera, I feel like a pro and with the results I'm getting, pretty soon I'm going to tell people I am!  Buy this camera.

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: Roman Vasquez
Reviews.Content: Everything was great except for the Chinese products like the card readers those products just does not work, otherwise is excellent bundle.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: drhornbrook
Reviews.Content: The T3 is a pretty nice camera.  I had been looking at the T3i and so not quite what it has in video, but I like the set up and its easy to use.  I like to shoot with all manual settings, but if I hand it to someone who doesn't know how, its easy to set on auto and they take great pics too.

Reviews.Title: Good deal!
Reviews.Author: Jpa092
Reviews.Content: This purchase was a very good one! The camera by it self is awesome, it work perfectly! The lenses work great, no issues with it!... The accessories work perfectly, of course they're not the best or more well known brands but the work very good with the camera!It arrived on time as they told me and that is something very good!I recommend this product thoroughly! :)

Reviews.Title: Is perfect for me just love it!
Reviews.Author: Victor Serrano
Reviews.Content: I loved the camera, is just what I wanted, the two canon lenses are great, the other two addons are okay.  The contents of the package are very handy.  It was a great buy overall.

Reviews.Title: IN LOVE!!!
Reviews.Author: Denisse Moore
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to start getting photography, nothing serious but to have fun with it. Still trying to learn different settings but I love the way pictures look. I have a hard time putting this camera down. Definitely recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a beginner or just family pocs and outings.
Reviews.Author: devante franklin
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera. The first one I bought to start photography.  The user interface is great and very easy to use. I chose this thinking it was 18 mp but it was 12.2 but it still looks ok..Pros: ease of use. Lightweight and takes good photos of things like wildlifeCons: the mp first off was always a prob for me. The t3i was a little more but I have a friend who has had his for 2 years and loves it. The build is so....."plasticy" according to Kai on digitalrev's youtube review. Its just not a good keeper.its the kind of camer you learn tp use and then get rid of quickly. The camera just doesn't hold to anything I need anymore.now that I know how to take good photos its become a nuisance to have because the quality isn't what I want anymore. I'm now looking at the 7D which is so much better than this also compared by digitalrev.  Again great for someone starting off though. You should consider this as a low budget buy but the t3i would be better if you can get it.So ill probably use this as a back up camera in case my 7D craps out but the package it came with was great .you get the kit lens plus a 70 -300 and a bunch of accessories. Would recommend for beginner definitely not professional.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: glorizons
Reviews.Content: This was a very good deal. The price was so minimum if compared to purchasing each item separately. Props to the seller! I love my new toy. The case strap was slightly torn but that was the least of my worries. The camera functions properly as do all the lenses. The tripod may seem a little flimsy when used to the biggest height but being short I tend to use it on a notch shorter so it is okay. I love it.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.2 MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed.
ISO 100 - 6400 for shooting from bright to dim light.
Improved EOS HD Movie mode with expanded recording and with in-camera video editing options.
High speed, reliable 9-point AF system utilizing a high precision, f/5.6 cross-type center point.
Includes EOS Rebel T3 digital SLR camera and EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Type II Lens+Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens; 12 megapixel CMOS sensor; Eye-level SLR viewfinder
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR with 18-55mm IS II Lens (Black) + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens + 58mm 2x Telephoto lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens (4 Lens Kit!!!) W/16GB SDHC Memory + Extra LPE10 Battery/Charger + 3 Piece Filter Kit + Full Size Tripod + Accessory Kit
